title: Charles Deering McCormick Library: Libraries - Northwestern University
content: The McCormick Library of Special Collections and University Archives is home to many of the Libraries' rarest materials, including manuscripts, archives, prints, artifacts, and all materials pertaining to Northwestern's history. The McCormick Library's holdings are non-circulating and are open to the public for research and reference. University Library, Lower Level,1970 Campus Road, Evanston, IL 60208 Call 847-491-3635 or email specialcollections@northwestern.edu.
